title: (x) The Body Shop's packaging font... / sans - Helvetica Condensed {Jan}
content:
...does anyone what typeface this is that body shop use on their packaging?(here: [http://www.thebodyshop.co.uk/images/product/zoom/56824m\_z.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120219231032/http:/www.thebodyshop.co.uk/images/product/zoom/56824m_z.jpg "http://www.thebodyshop.co.uk/images/product/zoom/56824m\_z.jpg") )

identifont suggested folio, but I'm not convinced and I never found identifont that useful anywyay. plus they use what appears to be a "light condensed" version, which does not exist in the folio family...
author: design monkey

comments.content: ...oh and its used on the top menu too of the website( [http://www.thebodyshop.co.uk/\_en/\_gb/index.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20120219231032/http:/www.thebodyshop.co.uk/_en/_gb/index.aspx "http://www.thebodyshop.co.uk/\_en/\_gb/index.aspx") )... if anyone can help pretty quick be really greatful thanks...:)
oh really? hmm... I didn't even think of helvetica lol! I guess I'm in a bit of a panic to finish this project lol... Thanks:)
